message/new:
Ahoy! ... Did you forget?
Fabio, ser! It's Fabio!
message/old:
よう！　あ、忘れたか？
ファビオだよ、ファビオ

message/new:
What do you think of the audience chambers?
'Tis quite an atmosphere, is it not?
message/old:
《謁見の間》はどうだった？
独特の雰囲気だろ？

message/new:
If you want to feel more at ease,
you'll have to temper your wits as an Arisen.
message/old:
気後れしないためには、なるべく早く
一人前の覚者になる必要がある

message/new:
As such, I'll impart you with some wisdom!
Firstly, be sure to keep in touch with the locals.
message/old:
そのための、ちょっとしたコツを教えてやろう
まず、街を歩きまわって他人の話をよく聞くんだ

message/new: Specifically, the inns to the northeast.
message/old: 特に、北東にある宿場区の宿屋――

message/new:
'Tis where Archibald and Renton reside.
'Twould be wise to acquaint yourself with those two!
message/old:
そこにいるアーチボルトとレンテン――
この二人には必ず会っておけ

message/new:
They can train you in skills, abilities,
vocations, you name it.
message/old:
戦闘での動き方や、戦技スキルの習得
そして転職など――

message/new:
They may even have aught in the way of gossip.
Archibald and Renton--don't forget!
message/old:
有益な話をしてくれるはずだ
アーチボルトとレンテン――忘れるなよ

message/new:
Oh, actually,
why not go meet those two right now, ser?
message/old:
ああ、そうだ
今から宿場区へ行ってふたりに会ってくるといい

message/new:
Just introduce yourself, aye?
Afterwards, we'll talk again.
message/old:
まず、顔を覚えてもらうんだな
それが終わったら、また話そう
